extension_description.message: Bobongola makomi oyo oponi na lokasa ya internet mpe bobongola na format oyo elakisami.

turn_off_description.message: Bouton ya kobongola ekobima mbala nyonso oyo makomi oponi

turn_on_description.message: Bouton ya kobongola ekolakisama te ntango makomi eponami kasi okoki kaka kobongola na kofinaka elembo ya Pro Translate na barre d’outils

privacy_policy.message: Politiki ya kobatela makambo ya moto ye moko

ui_language_description.message: Pona monoko ya UI ya liboso

auto_switch.message: Bobongola automatiquement na monoko ya mibale oyo olingi

auto_switch_description.message: Ntango makomi oyo oponi ezali monɔkɔ oyo olingi kozwa, bongola yango na monɔkɔ ya mibale oyo olingi kozwa

second_target_language.message: Monoko ya mibale oyo balingi kozwa

second_target_language_description.message: Pona monoko ya mibale ya cible par défaut

target_format_description.message: Pona format ya cible par défaut, format ekoki ko changer na panneau ya traduction

auto_set_format_description.message: Ntango ozali kobongola format na panneau ya libongoli, tyá format oyo oponi na format ya liboso

format_and_order.message: Format ya panneau ya traduction na ordre

format_and_order_description.message: Format ba cas oyo ekoki ko changer na panneau ya traduction na ordre ya affichage

translate_button_on_description.message: Bouton ya kobongola ekobima mbala nyonso oyo makomi oponi

translate_button_off_description.message: Bouton ya kobongola ekolakisama te ntango makomi eponami kasi okoki kaka kobongola na kofinaka elembo ya Pro Translate na barre d’outils
